title: Where to post Threads related to Patch 7.17?
body:
Apparently "Gameplay" isnt the right board. 

Then which is it?

Also what really annoys me that you Guys keep posting Videos everywhere and one of my Sub Acc's got perm. banned on the Forums for doing so. 
According to the Arbiters Videos are ONLY allowed to be posted in "Concepts & Creations"

replies.body: Well, I'm honestly not sure why that other post would have been deleted from Gameplay, but we do have a Patch Megathread for each patch right here in Help & Support stickied at the top. It might be better suited in that thread.
